blocks.name: reldvds
blocks.content: The divides relation is in fact a relation. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: nznngen
blocks.content: All positive integers in the set of multiples of _n_, nℤ, are the absolute value of _n_ or greater. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: nzss
blocks.content: The set of multiples of _m_, mℤ, is a subset of those of _n_, nℤ, iff _n_ divides _m_. Lemma 2.1(a) of ~ https://www.mscs.dal.ca/~~selinger/3343/handouts/ideals.pdf p. 5, with mℤ and nℤ as images of the divides relation under _m_ and _n_. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: nzin
blocks.content: The intersection of the set of multiples of _m_, mℤ, and those of _n_, nℤ, is the set of multiples of their least common multiple. Roughly Lemma 2.1(c) of ~ https://www.mscs.dal.ca/~~selinger/3343/handouts/ideals.pdf p. 5 and Problem 1(b) of ~ https://people.math.binghamton.edu/mazur/teach/40107/40107h16sol.pdf p. 1, with mℤ and nℤ as images of the divides relation under _m_ and _n_. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.)
